title: 'Pay and smile' - Rome visitors face Trevi Fountain charge
summary_full: Italy's capital city has introduced a €2 fee to access the viewing area of its iconic fountain, which had previously been free to visit.
summary_public: Italy's capital city has introduced a €2 fee to access the viewing area of its iconic fountain, which had previously been free to visit.

IT.label: negative
IT.evidence: Rome visitors face Trevi Fountain charge
